views.name: New episode
views.title: New episode? Fill in the details below!
views.submit_action_message: This episode idea has been submitted!

rows.field_488092: Learn how to declutter your mind with special guest Emil Wagstaff.
Dive into 5 healthy habits of highly efficient people with Caroline Pittman.

rows.field_488069: Silence the negativity in your brain
rows.field_488092: Samson Emerson teaches us how to shift our focus from the negativity in our minds to the positivity.
Special guests Kaif Spence and Dionnne Beattie takes us through the best way to set healthy boundaries. They'll be sharing plenty of their own experiences!
Rocco Whitehead and Kanye Discoll nagivate the difficult decision of no longer putting yourself last.

rows.field_488069: Deep breathing  could save your life
rows.field_488092: Kanye Driscoll returns to talk about the best ways to deep breathe.
Special guest Reo O'Quinn joins us to discuss small steps to take when trying to recover from the all too common burnout.
Ammarah Frame talks us through the friendship as an adult realm.
Dionne Beattie returns to explain how we can distance ourselves from the things that bring our hearts pain.
Lyned Villarreal joins us to highlight the significant of creativity- and how we can embrace it.
Two guests dive deep into the psychology behind making decisions and taking risks.
